document_data.name: Snowberry
document_data.mainbody: '''Snowberries''' were a general term for berries in [[the North]] that came from a variety of different bushes and vines, but all shared the same property of being quite pleasant and edible when frozen. This classification was mainly used by [[ranger]]s and [[Uthgardt]] [[barbarian]]s.{{Cite web/Candlekeep forum/Questions for Ed Greenwood (2004)/Fruits in the Realms}}
document_data.Habitats:
Places in the Realms where snowberries were known to grow included:
* The [[Fallen Lands]].
* Near the settlement of [[Glister]] in the northern [[Moonsea]] region.
* Throughout [[Icewind Dale]].
* In the [[Luruar]] region, these could be found in the [[Ice Mountains]].
* All across the [[Sword Coast North]].
